2024 年 8 月 8 日星期四 08:01:57 +0000每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks TED - TED.com TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 TED 会议上值得传播的想法泰德TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 zh知识共享：https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/泰德contact@ted.com https://pl.tedcdn.com/rss_feed_images/ted_talks_main_podcast/video.png每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks 144 144 科学技术娱乐设计 TED、TEDTalks、TED 演讲、灵感、创造力、技术演示、教育不非成人的
奥林匹克精神——以及如何利用它|艾莉森·菲利克斯艾莉森·菲利克斯Allyson Felix is an 11-time Olympic medalist and the most decorated track and field athlete of all time. She joined us live from the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris to share her sharp take on how to navigate setbacks, thrive under pressure and find purpose beyond winning — tips that will resonate with everyone, not just those going for gold. (This conversation was hosted by TED’s Whitney Pennington Rodgers. Visit ted.com/membership to support TED today and join more exclusive events like this one.)奥林匹克精神——以及如何利用它|艾莉森·菲利克斯Allyson Felix is an 11-time Olympic medalist and the most decorated track and field athlete of all time. She joined us live from the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris to share her sharp take on how to navigate setbacks, thrive under pressure and find purpose beyond winning — tips that will resonate with everyone, not just those going for gold. (This conversation was hosted by TED’s Whitney Pennington Rodgers. Visit ted.com/membership to support TED today and join more exclusive events like this one.) https://www.ted.com/talks/allyson_felix_the_olympic_spirit_and_how_you_can_tap_into_it?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:135722 135722 Wed, 07 Aug 2024 15:01:11 +0000高等教育不00:50:42泰德
创新者打造非洲蓬勃发展的科技场景 |和平伊蒂米和平伊蒂米“A new reality has emerged, one where ambitious Africans are writing their own stories as builders and as innovators,” says business storyteller Peace Itimi. Taking us inside Africa’s booming tech scene, she highlights the trailblazing entrepreneurs and startups reshaping Africa's economy through innovation and ambition.创新者打造非洲蓬勃发展的科技场景 |和平伊蒂米“A new reality has emerged, one where ambitious Africans are writing their own stories as builders and as innovators,” says business storyteller Peace Itimi. 如何不尊重而不是仇恨|斯宾塞·考克斯斯宾塞·考克斯Spencer J. Cox, Republican governor of the state of Utah in the United States, says that even in these deeply polarized times, it's still possible to disagree without hate or contempt. He shows how this idea sparked a viral campaign ad he co-created with his Democratic political opponent back in 2020 — and shares four practical things every one of us can do to heal the divides in our nations and neighborhoods. (TED is a non-partisan 501(c)(3) tax-exempt organization and does not participate or intervene in any political campaign and neither supports nor opposes any candidate for public office.)如何不尊重而不是仇恨|斯宾塞·考克斯Spencer J. Cox, Republican governor of the state of Utah in the United States, says that even in these deeply polarized times, it's still possible to disagree without hate or contempt. (TED is a non-partisan 501(c)(3) tax-exempt organization and does not participate or intervene in any political campaign and neither supports nor opposes any candidate for public office.) https://www.ted.com/talks/spencer_j_cox_how_to_disagree_with_respect_not_hate?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:135212 135212 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 14:53:56 +0000高等教育不00:12:13泰德
将气候解决方案付诸实践的无名英雄 |艾琳·苏萨艾琳·苏萨The improper handling of waste is the third largest source of methane emissions in the world, says Aline Sousa, but waste pickers like her help reduce this environmental impact. She dives into the monumental effort of the often-overlooked people making sure recyclables, compostables and trash end up in the right places — and calls for better recognition of these key players on the frontline of fighting climate change.将气候解决方案付诸实践的无名英雄 |艾琳·苏萨The improper handling of waste is the third largest source of methane emissions in the world, says Aline Sousa, but waste pickers like her help reduce this environmental impact. 如何突破恐惧，成为领导者 |瓦莱丽·蒙哥马利·赖斯瓦莱丽·蒙哥马利·赖斯Vigilance. Grit. Resilience. Valerie Montgomery Rice, the president and CEO of Morehouse School of Medicine, shares where she learned these key qualities of successful leadership, offering three lessons for anyone who wants to overcome their fears, stand up for what’s right and build opportunity for all.如何突破恐惧，成为领导者 |瓦莱丽·蒙哥马利·赖斯Vigilance. 为什么气候运动不投票？ |纳撒尼尔·斯廷内特纳撒尼尔·斯廷内特Millions of people say they care deeply about climate change ... yet they're not showing up at elections to turn their concern into political power, says environmental voting advocate Nathaniel Stinnett. He explains why increasing voter participation is essential to advancing the climate movement and shows how his team is mobilizing millions of new environmental voters — without talking about climate change at all.为什么气候运动不投票？ |纳撒尼尔·斯廷内特Millions of people say they care deeply about climate change ... yet they're not showing up at elections to turn their concern into political power, says environmental voting advocate Nathaniel Stinnett. He explains why increasing voter participation is essential to advancing the climate movement and shows how his team is mobilizing millions of new environmental voters — without talking about climate change at all. https://www.ted.com/talks/nathaniel_stinnett_why_isn_t_the_climate_movement_voting?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:135253 135253 Thu, 01 Aug 2024 14:51:52 +0000高等教育不00:11:27泰德
寻找理想工作场所的秘诀 |马里恩·坎潘马里恩·坎潘What's the most important thing to look for when applying for a new job? Entrepreneur Marion Campan advocates for a focus on company culture above all else. She offers practical strategies for evaluating companies before accepting a new position — including how to ask the right questions about values, feedback and expectations — to help job seekers find positions where they can thrive.寻找理想工作场所的秘诀 |马里恩·坎潘What's the most important thing to look for when applying for a new job? Entrepreneur Marion Campan advocates for a focus on company culture above all else. 通往天空的烟火梯——以及爆炸艺术的魔力|蔡国强蔡国强From a boy setting off small explosions in his living room to the creator of world-famous pyrotechnic events, multidisciplinary artist Cai Guo-Qiang has always been drawn to gunpowder. He gives a stunning tour of his work — including his fireworks spectacle at the 2008 Beijing Olympics, his "sky ladder" of fire reaching to the clouds and new work created with AI — and shows how his art probes the line between destruction and construction, control and freedom, violence and beauty. (This talk was delivered in Mandarin and translated live into English. The translation was put through a custom AI model of Cai Guo-Qiang's voice, powered by technology from Metaphysic. You'll hear how Cai would sound if he were speaking English.)通往天空的烟火梯——以及爆炸艺术的魔力|蔡国强From a boy setting off small explosions in his living room to the creator of world-famous pyrotechnic events, multidisciplinary artist Cai Guo-Qiang has always been drawn to gunpowder. He gives a stunning tour of his work — including his fireworks spectacle at the 2008 Beijing Olympics, his "sky ladder" of fire reaching to the clouds and new work created with AI — and shows how his art probes the line between destruction and construction, control and freedom, violence and beauty. (This talk was delivered in Mandarin and translated live into English. The translation was put through a custom AI model of Cai Guo-Qiang's voice, powered by technology from Metaphysic. You'll hear how Cai would sound if he were speaking English.) https://www.ted.com/talks/cai_guo_qiang_a_firework_ladder_to_the_sky_and_the_magic_of_explosive_art?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:135242 135242 Tue, 30 Jul 2024 14:54:21 +0000高等教育不00:15:56泰德
无限能量的秘密力量？激光|马塔米马塔米In 2022, physicist Tammy Ma and the team at Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory achieved a scientific breakthrough decades in the making: fusion ignition, or the combining of two atoms to generate more energy out of a reaction than was put in — recreating on Earth the same process that powers the Sun. She explains how they used a giant laser (way, way bigger than you're thinking) to catalyze this reaction and shares a vision for how this technology could change the world by creating limitless clean energy.无限能量的秘密力量？激光|马塔米In 2022, physicist Tammy Ma and the team at Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory achieved a scientific breakthrough decades in the making: fusion ignition, or the combining of two atoms to generate more energy out of a reaction than was put in — recreating on Earth the same process that powers the Sun. She explains how they used a giant laser (way, way bigger than you're thinking) to catalyze this reaction and shares a vision for how this technology could change the world by creating limitless clean energy. https://www.ted.com/talks/tammy_ma_the_secret_force_for_limitless_energy_lasers?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:134418 134418 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 14:53:02 +0000高等教育不00:13:36泰德
战争新闻应该植根于同理心，而不是暴力|贝尔特鲁贝尔特鲁We need journalism that moves beyond a constant focus on violence and honestly depicts the full impact of war, in and out of the trenches, says conflict journalist Bel Trew. She makes a passionate call for war reporting to be rooted in compassion and truth, sharing stories that illuminate the human toll of conflict with the hope of healing our fractured world.战争新闻应该植根于同理心，而不是暴力|贝尔特鲁We need journalism that moves beyond a constant focus on violence and honestly depicts the full impact of war, in and out of the trenches, says conflict journalist Bel Trew. She makes a passionate call for war reporting to be rooted in compassion and truth, sharing stories that illuminate the human toll of conflict with the hope of healing our fractured world. https://www.ted.com/talks/bel_trew_war_journalism_should_be_rooted_in_empathy_not_violence?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:135109 135109 Fri, 26 Jul 2024 14:45:58 +0000高等教育不00:14:48泰德
食物和气候问题——以及如何解决它|乔纳森·弗利乔纳森·弗利Global food production — from meat to grains — accounts for a third of all greenhouse gas emissions, says sustainability scientist Jonathan Foley. He presents a portfolio of data-backed solutions to build a better food system world-wide, starting with four key steps to cut emissions.食物和气候问题——以及如何解决它|乔纳森·弗利Global food production — from meat to grains — accounts for a third of all greenhouse gas emissions, says sustainability scientist Jonathan Foley.
